text: is a Japanese city in Fukuoka Prefecture on the island of Kyushu.Nussbaum, Louis-Frédéric. (2002). "Chikugo" in Japan Encyclopedia, p. 113. ==Geography== The city of Chikugo is near Kurume, Fukuoka. ==Related pages== *Chikugo Province ==References== ==Other websites== * http://www.city.chikugo.fukuoka.jp/ Category:Cities in Fukuoka Prefecture
title: Chikugo, Fukuoka
